layman_description: A storage box where you keep items organized.
technical_description: Container entity with inventory grid capacity and opening/closing state.
player_impact: Stores items to increase your carrying capacity.

layman_description: A secure locked box for storing valuables safely.
technical_description: Container with lock-state management and reduced access unless authorized.
player_impact: Stores items securely that others can't easily access.

layman_description: A container specifically for storing ammunition neatly.
player_impact: Organized ammunition storage that saves inventory space.

layman_description: A work surface where you combine materials to create items.
technical_description: Crafting interface with recipe database and quality-based outputs.
player_impact: Lets you craft items from raw materials.

layman_description: A container for cooking raw food into prepared meals.
technical_description: Crafting container specialized for food recipes and heat conversion.
player_impact: Turns raw foods into better healing items.

layman_description: A hot container that smelts ore into metal ingots.
technical_description: Processing device with fuel input and ore-smelting recipes.
player_impact: Converts ore into usable metal for crafting.

layman_description: A storage tank for collecting and storing water.
technical_description: Water-storage container with volume tracking and fill-level state.
player_impact: Stores water for drinking and base operations.

layman_description: A shelf for storing books that improve your skills.
player_impact: Displays books you've read for reference.

layman_description: A small bedside table for storing personal items.
technical_description: Decorative container with small inventory and resting mechanic.

layman_description: A stand for displaying and organizing different outfits.
technical_description: Equipment storage specialized for armor variants and cosmetics.
player_impact: Stores extra armor and clothing options.
